00291 // =======================================================================
00292 //                                     Implementation of inlined methods =
00293 
00294 
00295 inline bool 
00296 IsabBoxInterfaceRequest::wantRead() const {
00297    return getState() == Ready_To_IO_Request;
00298 }
00299 
00300 
00301 inline bool 
00302 IsabBoxInterfaceRequest::wantWrite() const {
00303    return getState() == Ready_To_IO_Reply;
00304 }
00305 
00306
